ISSUE.TITLE: Checkout branches other than master?
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: How does one go about checking out branches other than master? I see the .drone.yml in this directory has a `git` field in the yaml, but I haven't found the documentation for it. Trying out ``` yaml git: branch: source ``` doesn't seem to do the trick.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: [GITRPC] Fix bug in commiter date for `Commit` API (#780)
